contentrichtext.text: {{See also|Zierer (surname)}} {{unreferenced|date=September 2008}} {{Infobox company | name = Zierer | logo = [[File:Zierer logo.png|250px]] | caption = | type = | traded_as = | fate = | predecessor = | successor = | foundation = <!-- {{Start date|YYYY|MM|DD}} --> | founder = | defunct = <!-- {{End date|YYYY|MM|DD}} --> | location_city = [[Deggendorf]] | location_country = [[Germany]] | location = | locations = | area_served = | key_people = | industry = [[Manufacturing]] | products = [[Amusement ride]]s, [[roller coaster]]s | services = | revenue = | operating_income = | net_income = | aum = <!-- Only used with financial services companies --> | assets = | equity = | owner = | num_employees = 50 (approx.) | parent = | divisions = | subsid = | homepage = {{URL|http://www.zierer.com}} | footnotes = | intl = }} [[File:Wicked at Lagoon.JPG|thumb|right|260px|Wicked at Lagoon Park, manufactured by Zierer]] '''Zierer''' is a [[Germany|German]] company located close to [[Deggendorf]]. Zierer manufactures Tivoli and Force line of [[roller coaster]]s, as well as panoramic wheels, [[Wave Swinger|wave swinger]]s, [[magic carpet|flying carpet]]s, ''Hextentanz'' and ''Kontiki'' rides. The company also has partnered with [[Anton Schwarzkopf|Schwarzkopf]] to build ''[[Lisebergbanan]]'' at [[Liseberg]] and ''[[Knightmare (Camelot)|Knightmare]]'' at [[Camelot Theme Park]]. == Notable installations == {| class= "wikitable sortable" |- ! Name !! Model !! Location !! Opened !!
